issue.title: [R] Test for RecordBatchReader to C-interface fails on arrow-r-minimal due to missing dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13116](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13116). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The test just needs updating with skip_if_not_available("dataset")

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13116?focusedCommentId=17365999) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10554
